幎字的基本解释

幎
mì
古同“幂”，覆盖物体的巾或幔；覆盖。
均匀的样子。

幎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mì］
［《廣韻》莫狄切，入錫，明。］
(1)用作覆盖用的巾幔。
(2)覆盖。
(3)均匀貌。

幎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幎； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页335第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?莫狄切，音覓。【說文】幔也。【玉篇】簾也。　又【玉篇】覆也。【儀禮·士喪禮】幎目用緇。【註】幎目，覆面者也。　又均致貌。【周禮·冬官考工記】輪人望而眂其輪，欲其幎爾而下迆也。【註】幎，均致貌。　又【集韻】【類篇】?民堅切，音眠。又【集韻】?經切，音冥。又【集韻】眠見切，音麪。義?同。

幎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幎字的起名意思

暂无。

幎
Basic explanation of words
幎
mì
In ancient times, the same "power", a towel or veil covering an object; covering.
Even look.
幎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mì］
["Guangyun" Modiqie, enter the tin, and Ming. ]
(1) A napkin used for covering.
(2) Covering.
(3) Uniform appearance.
幎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幎; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 335 04
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】? Modiche, Yinmi. 【Said the text】Mantle also. [Jade articles] The curtain is also.　[Jade articles] again. [Rituals·Funerals] Use a scorpion for the eyes. [Note] The one who covers the face is also the head.　 It looks good again. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The round people look at the wheel, and if they want it, they will go down. [Note] All of them look good.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? People are strong, sound sleep. Also 【Ji Yun】? Jing Qi, Yin Ming. Also 【Jiyun】Mian see cut, sound surface. Righteous? Same.
幎
